description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes (light and dark) in a Tic Tac Toe web application, including styles for the main app structure and buttons.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styles including layout and background color management.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo with animation effects.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button with effects for hover and active states.
